```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
#source("R/shiny-functions.R")
sim <- readRDS("documents/presentation/data/sim.rds")
to_jitter <- bind_rows(
  sim$data$seedoutput %>% select(X, Y, life_stage, gen),
  sim$data$juveniles %>% select(X, Y, life_stage, gen)
)
to_jitter$life_stage <- as.factor(to_jitter$life_stage)
to_point <- sim$data$adults %>% select(X, Y, life_stage, gen)
```

## The landscape

```{r landscape}
inputPanel(
  sliderInput("gen", "Generation", min = 0, max = 25, value = 0, step = 1, width = "100%")
)

renderPlot({
  qplot(
    X, Y,
    data = to_jitter %>% filter(gen == input$gen),
    geom = "count"
  ) + theme_classic() + theme(
    legend.position = "top"
  )
})
```
